A higher person would also travel up it.
The Buddha said in a verse from Huiquan.
"My head is covered with dust, and my boots are torn.
There are not two in the chosen place of a buddha.
If the path were to return with an empty heart, then the hammer on top of his head would be difficult to release.
It would be difficult to let go of the hammer on top of his head.

source_sentence: 洞山价禪師悟無情說法偈云。
translation: The Dongshan Pratibhāna Master realized the teaching of the Dharma to the insentient, saying.
"It's also very strange.
It's also very surprising.
The teaching of the teaching of insentient beings is inconceivable.
It's ultimately difficult to understand when you hear it with your ears.
It's only when you hear it with your eyes that you'll know it.
The south hall's quiet verse says.
"They're beautiful.
'The myriad things that exist are all treasures.
Every single thing in the world is a family treasure.
A person who doesn't know them is just barren.'
The Chan Master Yangshan Ji asked Xiang Yan.

source_sentence: 聞師弟近日有甚悟道頌。
translation: "I heard that my disciple recently wrote a verse about enlightenment.
Would you like to cite it?
Yan raised it (his verse is found at the gate of the enlightenment).
The teacher said, "This is something I put up in my spare time.
Yan then gave him another verse, saying.
'Last year, I was poor.
He wasn't poor yet.
This year, I'm poor.
He's just beginning to be poor.
Last year, there was no place to put a cone.
This year, there's no awl either.
The teacher said.
'You've only attained tathāgata meditation.
You haven't yet attained the patriarch's meditation.
After he presented another verse, Xiang Yan said.
"I have a single faculty.
I'll show it to you with a glance.
If you don't know it, don't call the monk.
I'll call the novice separately.

source_sentence: 師云且喜師弟會得祖師禪。
translation: The teacher said, "We're also glad that our junior teacher has attained patriarchal Chan.
Xuanjue Zhengyun said.

source_sentence: 且道如來禪與祖師禪分不分。
translation: 'Is there a difference between tathāgata meditation and patriarchal meditation?'
Chang Qing Leng said.
He sat there for a while.
Yunju Xizheng said.

source_sentence: 眾中商量如來禪淺祖師禪深。
translation: "Many people discussed that the Tathāgata's Chan was shallow and the patriarch's Chan was deep.

source_sentence: 只如香嚴當時何不問如何是祖師禪。
translation: Why didn't they just ask, 'How is patriarchal Chan?'
If they had put that question there, where would it have been?
Where would it have existed?'
Luangfu Jueyun said.
"Emperor Wu sought immortality but didn't attain it.
Wang Qiao was sitting at the end but ascended to heaven.
The great satyr Cheol said.
"Fragrant adornment can be described as having no piece of tile on top and no straw cone on the bottom.
There's not a single tile on the top and no straw awl on the bottom.
It's naked and exposed.
He's naked and sprinkled.
There's nothing to grasp onto.
If it weren't for Yangshan.
I'd almost have let this man go.
Why is it so?
He didn't know the power of snow and frost.
How can you know the power of pines and cypresses?
The south hall's quiet verse says.
'Sound is not sound before we see the path.
Where form isn't form, it's simply emptiness.
Only when refined gold is refined a hundred times does it become a vessel.
Only when it's sharpened again does it reveal its effectiveness.
Kukki Gen'on says.
'Nothing is poor until there's a ground and a cone.'
He knows there's nothing yet, and he guards the body of nothing.
The Nong family has recently become very poor.
I don't see the person who was poor in the beginning.
Chan Groves Collected Documents, Vol. 8
